description: Converts the color in RGB color space to HSV color space

properties.name: hue
properties.description: The hue of the color, in degrees. Decides if itâ€™s red, blue, purple, etc.

properties.name: saturation
properties.description: The colorfulness of the color. 0.0 gives gray scale colors and 1.0 will give absolutely clear colors.

properties.name: brightness
properties.description: Decides how bright the color will look. 0.0 will be black, and 1.0 will give a bright an clear color that goes towards white when saturation goes towards 0.0.
